segments.text: I ’ m worried about my daughter . She can ’ t decide about college .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t worry . That ’ s just a part of being a teenager .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t mind that . But she disagrees with me about everything .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should encourage her to make up her mind by herself . You shouldn ’ t affect her decision .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I just want to give her some tips .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , she can make her own decisions .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Believe me . Everything will be ok .
segments.speaker: S1
